questions.question: How many players are on each team in soccer?
The total playing time in a soccer game is usually

choices.answer: 90 mins made up of 2 halves (45 mins each)
90 mins made up of 4 quarters (15 mins each)

questions.question: In soccer the rule about using your hands is..

choices.answer: No player can ever touch the ball with their hands
Only the goalie can use their hands
The goalie or a player completing a throw in can use hands
A player can use their upper arms but not their hands.

questions.question: Which of the following is not true about a throw-in?

choices.answer: The ball must be released from both hands
The ball must be thrown over the top of the players head
Both the players feet must remain on the ground
A throw-in can be a chest pass

questions.question: Are any of these players in an offside position?
What is another name for soccer?
Which of the following is not a position in soccer?
What happens when someone (other than the goalie) touches the ball with their hands?

choices.answer: A free kick is awarded to the opposite team
A goal is awarded to the other team
A throw-in is awarded to the other team

questions.question: On which parts of the field is the goalie allowed to use their hands?

choices.answer: Only in their half of the field

questions.question: If you receive a yellow card, you get what?
If you receive a red card, you get what?

choices.answer: You are sent off the field

questions.question: Which of the following is not true about a kick off?

choices.answer: The ball must be kicked forward across the half way line
All players must be in their own half of the field
The team that scores gets to take the kick off after a goal
A kick off is taken to start a game

questions.question: A penalty kick can be awarded when...

choices.answer: A defender trips an attacker in the penalty box
A defender pushes a player near the half way line
An attacker misses the goal in a penalty shoot out

questions.question: The attacking teams is awarded a corner kick when the ball

choices.answer: is touched by the hand of any player
..goes over the goal line and is last touched by an attacker
...goes over the goal line and is last touched by a defender

questions.question: Usually, how many referees are there in a game of soccer?
